title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1271.30 - Pilots required to report any accident causing injury or damage
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1271.30 - Pilots required to report any accident causing injury or damage

State Regulations

The pilot of any aircraft involved in any accident
causing personal injury or property damage at the air terminal shall make a
prompt and full report of said accident to the manager. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1271.30

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
